definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: China, he said, was not trying to spread radical anti-American ideologies.
sentences.chinese: 他说，中国不想散播极端反美意识。

sentences.english: The third essential change is the solidification of anti-Americanism as a political idea.
sentences.chinese: 第三个变化就是反美主义正在团结成为一种政治理念。

sentences.english: In Europe, this anti-Americanism soon expanded to cultural matters.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的反美情绪很快扩展到文化领域。

sentences.english: Prominent anti-American slogans in Tienanmen Square have still not been taken down.
sentences.chinese: 天安门广场上显眼的反美标语仍没有被撤下。

sentences.english: And anti-American finger-pointing will only make it harder to extract the climate-change legislation from the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 粗暴的反美只会使参议院更加难以通过气候变化法案。

sentences.english: Western leftists were enamored with its Marxist anti-Americanism.
sentences.chinese: 西方的左派被书中马克思主义的反美论调所倾倒。

sentences.english: President Bush is often the target of anti-American demonstrations.
sentences.chinese: 布什总统常是反美示威游行的目标。

sentences.english: Iraqi militiamen from the ruling Ba'ath party shout anti-US slogans in a trench in the city of Baghdad.
sentences.chinese: 一伊拉克士兵在巴格达战壕里呼喊着反美口号。

sentences.english: France is actually not that anti-American.
Mr Putin's speech contained a large dollop of self - serving anti - American cant.
sentences.chinese: 普京的演讲中包含着大量自私的反美言辞。

sentences.english: Another Chinese regretted the times when Russia was on the frontlines of opposition to the US.
sentences.chinese: 另一个中国人则怀念俄罗斯站在反美第一线的时光。

sentences.english: UNDP floor leader Kim says the protesters should not be seen as anti-American.
sentences.chinese: 新民主联合党发言人金孝硕说，这些抗议者并非反美。

sentences.english: All this may sound hopelessly anti-American to some.
sentences.chinese: 对一些人来说，所有这些听起来可能都是反美无望了。

sentences.english: Phillip65 Nothing to do with 'anti-USA'…the USA isowned by the people that organised this.
sentences.chinese: 层主，谁会“反美”啊，美国是人民自发组织建立的。

sentences.english: During the trip there was also a violent anti-American demonstration in the capital.
sentences.chinese: 在此期间，危地马拉首都出现了一个暴力反美集会。

sentences.english: This article introduces and analyzed the characteristics of the military actions of the anti-America armed forces.
sentences.chinese: 分析了伊拉克反美武装军事行动的几个特点。
